segments.text: I've got some bad news about the bike you lent me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I fell on the way to school , and your bike got scratched . I'm really sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it . It's not new , it already has a few scratches . Did you get hurt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's kind of you to say . I feel a little stupid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you lent me the bike , it looked brand new , almost anyway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe , but really I have fallen a couple of times and it's been hit once or twice as well .
segments.speaker: S2
